result.eng: Doctors give them medicines which give them relief but do not cure them.
result.ga: Tugann dochtúirí cógas dóibh a thugann faoiseamh dóibh ach nach leigheasann iad
result.orig: Tugann dochtúirí cógas dóibh a thugann faoiseamh dóibh ach nach leigheasann iad
result.html: Tugann dochtúirí cógas dóibh a thugann faoiseamh dóibh ach nach leigheasann iadDoctors give them medicines which give them relief but do not cure them.
result.ponchtml: Tugann doċtúirí cógas dóiḃ a ṫugann faoiseaṁ dóiḃ aċ naċ leiġeasann iadDoctors give them medicines which give them relief but do not cure them.

result.eng: This is a good example of what happens when amateurs undertake the research.
result.ga: Seo sampla maith dá dtiteann amach nuair a thugann amaitéaraigh faoin taighde
result.orig: Seo sampla maith dá dtiteann amach nuair a thugann amaitéaraigh faoin taighde
result.html: Seo sampla maith dá dtiteann amach nuair a thugann amaitéaraigh faoin taighdeThis is a good example of what happens when amateurs undertake the research.
result.ponchtml: Seo sampla maiṫ dá dtiteann amaċ nuair a ṫugann amaitéaraiġ faoin taiġdeThis is a good example of what happens when amateurs undertake the research.

result.eng: Sometimes the media pay attention to those cases, other times they don't.
result.ga: Amanna tugann na meáin aird ar na cásanna sin amanna eile ní thugann
result.orig: Amanna tugann na meáin aird ar na cásanna sin amanna eile ní thugann
result.html: Amanna tugann na meáin aird ar na cásanna sin amanna eile ní thugannSometimes the media pay attention to those cases, other times they don't.
result.ponchtml: Amanna tugann na meáin aird ar na cásanna sin amanna eile ní ṫugannSometimes the media pay attention to those cases, other times they don't.
